ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Hell, where they will roast. What an evil resting-place!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Hell, in which they will burn. How vile a resting place!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Hell, where they will be roasted. An evil place to dwell!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will suffer in hell. What a terrible dwelling!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Hell; which they shall enter; what an evil resting-place!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Hell! Where they will enter it, and worst (indeed) is that place to rest!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Hell; they shall enter it, so evil is the resting-place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Gehenna, wherein they are roasted - an evil cradling!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Hell, where they will burn, an evil resting-place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: they will burn, in Hell, an evil resting place --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Hell, wherein they roast: a wretched couch.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: hell, which they shall enter, an evil resting place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Hell!- they will burn therein, - an evil bed (indeed, to lie on)!-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Hell! Where they will burn, and worst (indeed) is that place to rest!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They shall roast in (the Fire) of Gehenna, an evil cradling.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Hell; in which they will roast; what a miserable abode!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the resting place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:56] Hell, which they will enter — an evil resting place!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Hell, where they will burn) on the Day of Judgement, (an evil resting place) the Fire is an evil abode for them.
